title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Introduction, layered network architecture, circuit switching, packet switching, data link protocols, stop and wait, sliding window, HDLC, queuing systems and other Markov systems – delay analysis in data network, LAN protocols, CSMA/CD, token ring, FDDI, network layer routing, repeaters, bridges, gateways, TCP/IP, internet protocols.
